content:

thought: To craft a spruce_slab, I need to craft spruce_planks. Spruce_planks can be crafted from stripped_spruce_wood, which is located at slot 10. Therefore, I will move the stripped_spruce_wood from slot 10 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
